Beaverton.Congregation Neveh Shalom:
Neveh Shalom is a congregation and synagogue affiliated with Conservative Judaism, located in Portland, Oregon, United States. It was founded in 1961, and currently has a congregation of over 1000 households.


== History ==
Formed in 1961 from the merger of Ahavai Shalom and Neveh Zedek Talmud Torah, the latter of which was also a merger of Neveh Zedek and Talmud Torah in 1902.
